pkgmetadata.longdescription: # htmltoolsTools for creating, manipulating, and writing HTML from Python.## Installation```shpip install htmltools```To install the latest development version from this repository:```shpip install https://github.com/rstudio/py-htmltools/tarball/main```## DevelopmentIf you want to do development on htmltools for Python:```shpip install -e ".[dev,test]"```
